channel.title: 508/525 FunPK Help
channel.description: [b]I need some help making some drops different. At the home on my 508/525 is the bank under G.E I want it to be like, you dont drop items there but the player that killed you gets random items, like the runescape pvp style.. I also want to know how to edit those drops. another thing is. how do i make it like that EVERYWHERE. but i also have a ::pvp tele that'll be staking so u get full drops of the player that u killed and they still lose their items. Will someone please help me on how might i go about doing so? my msn is gavinsamsal@hotmail.com you can always email at that same email. Thank you in advance. :)[/b]

item.title: 508/525 FunPK Help
item.dc:creator: @GavinSamsal GavinSamsal
item.description:
@GavinSamsal wrote:

I need some help making some drops different. At the home on my 508/525 is the bank under G.E I want it to be like, you dont drop items there but the player that killed you gets random items, like the runescape pvp style… I also want to know how to edit those drops. another thing is. how do i make it like that EVERYWHERE. but i also have a ::pvp tele that’ll be staking so u get full drops of the player that u killed and they still lose their items. Will someone please help me on how might i go about doing so? my msn is gavinsamsal@hotmail.com you can always email at that same email. Thank you in advance.
